review: GREAT as PROMISED!  Received yesterday, opened and installed easily.  Works on all TVs in home without need to login after initial set up was done in order to connect to one's WiFi.  Needed to use recommended adapter (which is included) and everything worked quickly and easily on first try.  Much better product than Google Chromecast.  Very satisfied and recommend fully!  Ron

review: I am obsessed with the Fire Sticks! I have three in my household and now I'm buying them for family as gifts. :) They make it soooo easy to manage all of my TV subscriptions and Im seriously considering cancelling my cable. With two teens and a hubby who watch all different shows, and me working from home, these sticks get a workout! If you have netflix and hulu or amazon prime or another subscription, you definitely need one of these. It allows you to search for a TV show or actor across all of the platforms at once. This is so awesome! I used to have to login to netflix, hulu plus, amazon instant video, HBO GO, etc every time I was looking for something. Now its so simple! I cant give it high enough stars, I wish I could give it 10! :D;
